desc: This is the future, and you're a big dreamer. The more shields you have, the more damage your weapon does.

name: Accidental Wealth
desc: Get 250 coins. This is what you need.

name: Acorn
desc: Your eggs can block bults from enemies.

name: Advanced Knife
desc: The more shields you have, the more melee damage you do.

name: Agent Watch
desc: Each time you pick up a key, your weapon damage will increase. Each time you use a key, your weapon damage will reduce.

name: Air Force Medal
desc: Increase your weapon damage when you are in the air.

name: Airdrop Supply
desc: Sometimes an airdrop happens after battle.

name: Alien Tech
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a heat-seeking bullet.

name: Alien Toy
desc: Launches 10 heat-seeking bullets after your bomb explodes.

name: Amethyst Necklace
desc: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra crystals.

name: Ancient Mask
desc: You have a chance to recover hearts each time you kill an enemy by bombs.

name: Angel Horn
desc: There's still a chance! Drops a Flying Heart and a Flying Shield when you get hurt.

name: Angry Mushroom
desc: Spawn an Angry Sprite each time you jump.

name: Annoying Hat
desc: You have a chance to drop extra crystals when you get hurt.

name: Atlantis Bubble
desc: Some of your bullets have shields that can block enemy bullets.

name: Azure Hourglass
desc: Generates a Guard Sprite when near death mid-battle.

name: Bad Apple
desc: Your poison runs through their veins. All your bullets now deal poison damage.

name: Bamboo Dragonfly
desc: If you're down to half a heart, you'll gain the ability to fly.

name: Barbecue Grill
desc: All normal bombs in this run become fire bombs.

name: Bargain Insurance
desc: Get a coin when any of your Angry Sprites dies.

name: Basketball Jersey
desc: MAMBA FOREVER! You'll only lose a maximum of half a heart when you get hurt.

name: Battle Pass
desc: Pay to Win! The more coins you have, the more bullets you can shoot.

name: Bear Bone Mask
desc: The more empty heart containers there are, the higher the max limit of Angry Sprites.

name: Bear Pendant
desc: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll drop extra eggs.

name: Beast Amulet
desc: It's raw power and passion, but hard to control. Reduce your rate of fire but greatly increase your weapon damage.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Beehive
desc: There's a chance you'll fire multiple bullets.

name: Beggar's Card
desc: While in this room, each time you pick something up, your weapon damage will increase.

name: Bent Spoon
desc: 98%....99%.... Add a crystal container and increase your gun's damage.

name: Berserker Blood
desc: The fury drive your body. The fewer hearts you have, the more bullets you can shoot.

name: Big Daddy
desc: You're immune to the explosion damage caused by yourself.

name: Birthday Cake
desc: A cake with "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" written on it. You are bigger! Also add two heart containers.

name: Black Box
desc: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll drop extra shields.

name: Black Friday
desc: It's shopping time! Everything in the shop is half price!

name: Black Rum
desc: When you use a bomb, your eggs will explode.

name: Blasting Cap 101
desc: Your explosion will create a cross-shaped blast.

name: Blasting Cap 5000
desc: Your explosion will create an X-shaped blast.

name: Blue Protocol
desc: Let it guide you... Add shields. Upgrade your weapon.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Blueberry Cake
desc: You have a chance to drop extra shields if you hatch an empty egg.

name: Bodyguard Glasses
desc: Easier to aim without glare in your eyes... Increase your weapon's damage.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Boom Gloves
desc: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra bombs.

name: Bottle Opener
desc: Spawns a ring of Angry Sprites when you use a key.

name: Brave Cookies
desc: B.A.D. (Brave And Delicious). Add shields and a heart container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Broccoli
desc: Healthy food! Contains a wide variety of vitamins! Add a heart container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Broken Kite
desc: You can fly when you have the max number of Angry Sprites.

name: Bullet Crown
desc: Each time an enemy is killed in this room, your weapon bullets increase.

name: Burning Talisman
desc: Angry Sprites leave a burning flame when they die.

name: B-Virus
desc: Each time you kill an enemy, there's a chance it will explode.

name: Can of Red Paint
desc: All jars are now red jars.

name: Candy Cane
desc: The more pets you have, the faster you can shoot.

name: Candy Corn
desc: The more pets you have, the further you can shoot.

name: Canned Cat Food
desc: You get some gifts from cats. Also add a heart container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Carp Streamer
desc: It catches the wind - just like you! You can make an extra jump.

name: Cat Medallion
desc: This cat-faced amulet vibrates softly around magic. The fewer crystals you have, the more damage your weapon does.

name: Chemical Burn
desc: Your explosion leaves a burst of fire behind.

name: Cherry Taste
desc: There's a chance your bullet will split into extra bullets. We know it's tempting, but don't lick any.

name: Chicken Burger
desc: You will drop extra hearts if you hatch an empty egg.

name: Chocolate Coin
desc: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop coins.

name: Chocolate Cookies
desc: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop a bomb.

name: Clay Doll
desc: Art is an explosion! There's a chance that killing an enemy will release an explosion from you.

name: Clown Hat
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a fake rat. And who wouldn't be scared of that?

name: Coin Bomb
desc: You get triple the coins, but coins will explode after 3 seconds if you haven't picked it up. Time is money, right?

name: Colorful Crown
desc: There's a chance your bullet will create a beautiful firework.

name: Combat Helmet
desc: The more shields you have, the more bullets your weapon shoots.

name: Cooling System
desc: Cool down your gun! All your bullets now deal ice damage.

name: Creambeer
desc: A beer that is certainly not a milkshake. Add a heart container and a crystal container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Cremation Box
desc: Angry sprites have a chance of dropping a small gift when they die.

name: Crown of Thorns
desc: Deal melee damage to enemies who make contact with you.

name: Cruel Sugar
desc: Increases the max limit of Angry Sprites by 1 for each of your pets.

name: Crystal Hard Candy
desc: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop 2 crystals.

name: Cursed Coin
desc: Turn all wooden chests to cursed chests[Note: May be removed since v1.4.3]

name: Cyborg
desc: Reduce your heart containers and add shields. Also increase your weapon's damage.

name: Dance Mask
desc: Upgrade your gun if you get hurt while in this room.

name: Danger Sign
desc: Your gun is full of electricity! All your bullets now deal electric damage.

name: Dangerous Mine
desc: Every time you jump, you leave a mine behind you. That sounds crazy or crazy AWESOME?

name: Dangerous Receipt
desc: You receive delivery of a batch of bombs.

name: Dark Side
desc: If you are down to half a heart, you'll immediately deal damage to all enemies.

name: Death Believer
desc: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra hearts.

name: Defensive Magic Scroll
desc: Crystals will orbit you when near death to block one bullet.

name: Defibrillator
desc: Revives the player upon a successful dance post-death.

name: Demon Book
desc: You will get 1 angry sprite each time you kill an enemy by explosions.

name: Demon Wings
desc: A little sacrifice goes a long way... Trade one heart container for the ability to fly.

name: Desert Elixir
desc: A strange potion with "Don't Drink Me" written on it.

name: Devil Horn
desc: These let you increase your weapon damage and melee damage, Don't worry about the sudden craving for flesh.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Devil Hotline
desc: Double your melee attack damage when you are in the air.

name: Devil's Trade
desc: Each time you get hurt, there's a chance you'll take double damage... or no damage at all.

name: Dimensional Bags
desc: You have a chance to receive random goodies when you get hurt.

name: Disco Light
desc: Jump Marks will summon music notes each time you land.

name: Divinity
desc: Your soul swells and you feel your feet lift off the ground... Increase your movement speed.

name: Double Yolks
desc: Two at a time baby, yeah! Double the number of eggs you have.

name: Doughnut
desc: The more eggs you have, the more bullets you will fire.

name: Drilling Warhead
desc: This is going to hurt... Increase your rate of fire and weapon damage.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Earth Bread
desc: An edible root known only to the Dwarves. Add a heart container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Eerie Axe
desc: Spawns an Angry Sprite when you kill an enemy with melee.

name: Elastic Gel
desc: The victory of science! Your bullet will randomly rebound when it hits the wall.

name: Electric Drill
desc: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance you'll gain a bomb.

name: Electric Sheep
desc: Do androids dream? When you have shields, you can make an extra jump.

name: Elf Bread
desc: A bite can keep you going all day. Increase your movement speed and recover a heart.

name: Emerald Bracelet
desc: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra bombs.

name: Empty Can
desc: If you don't have a key, you can use an egg instead.

name: Energy Cube
desc: Each time you activate the Portal Stone, there's a chance of getting a shield.

name: Eric's Candle
desc: Your melee attack deals fire damage.

name: E-Sports Headset
desc: Git gud. Increase your rate of fire and movement speed.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Espresso
desc: Feel that caffeine hit? It's BULLET TIME. Increase your rate of fire.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Eternal Stone
desc: You can manually cancel the hatching process of the egg by pressing [Cancel Key].

name: Evil Bracelet
desc: Every time you use a key, you'll get an angry sprite.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.4]

name: Evil Spare Parts
desc: Spawns the max number of Angry Sprites when a machine fails (gambling machine, gambling door, gambling box).

name: Expired Dog Food
desc: Like owner, like pet. Triggers the player's hurt effect when a pet is hurt.

name: Fanatic Mask
desc: You have a chance to recover hearts when you get hurt by an explosion.

name: Fatal Dance
desc: You will fires extra bullets downwards while you're in the air.

name: Film Magazine
desc: Now you know Gun Fu. Add extra bullets per shot and increase your weapon's range.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Firecrackers
desc: There's a chance your bomb will drop a pickup after it explodes in battle.

name: Firepower Badge
desc: Increase rate of fire.

name: Fission Badge
desc: Increase bullets.

name: Fission Device
desc: There's a chance your bullet will split into extra bullets. Stay out of the danger zone.

name: Flamingo Feathers
desc: Jump marks will shoot a fireball when your egg touches it.

name: Flowerpot
desc: There's a chance your bullet will split into extra bullets. A beautiful display of death.

name: Forbidden Mask
desc: You got promoted! Enhance your stats in all areas.

name: Fruit Popsicle
desc: It's always summer when you're eating a popsicle. Add a heart container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Frying Pan
desc: There's a chance that you'll block bullets fired at you.

name: Furious Chicken
desc: The more eggs you have, the more melee damage you do.

name: Future Tech
desc: Stylish eye protection, with added benefits. Add shields and increase your rate of fire.

name: Game Card
desc: The more Jump Marks you have, the more damage your gun does.

name: Gamma Ray
desc: Ain't nothing gonna stop you now! Your bullets can pass through walls.

name: Garand Clip
desc: Mow 'em down. Add extra bullets per shot and increase your weapon damage.

name: Gas Mask
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a poison bullet.

name: Ghost Bottle
desc: Launches piercing bullets after your bomb explodes.

name: Ghost Nail
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a piercing bullet.

name: Ghost Shell
desc: You have a chance to gain shields when you get hurt. There are some questions you can't avoid.

name: Giant Barbecue
desc: Trade your IQ for POWER! Add a heart container. Increase your weapon damage, but reduce your rate of fire.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Gingerbread Man
desc: If an attack kills you, you'll exchange an egg for half a heart.

name: Gladiator Helmet
desc: Increase your melee damage every time you get hurt in the current room.

name: Go Board
desc: Winning is positioning, timing... and being the last alive. Add extra bullets per shot and increase your movement speed.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Golden Apple
desc: The relic of the first civilization. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your movement speed slightly.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Golden Bell
desc: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance you'll receive extra coins.

name: Golden Bird
desc: The more coins you have, the faster you can shoot.

name: Golden Fist
desc: Each time you destroy a wooden box using melee damage, you gain 1 coin.

name: Golden Skulls
desc: The more coins you have, the more melee damage you do.

name: Golden Statuette
desc: You have a chance to get a guard sprite when you use coins. Don't you want to kiss it?

name: Golden Teeth
desc: Oof. Hope you like soup. Drop coins when you get hurt.

name: Golden Torch
desc: The light is warm. Get an extra treasure room at each new level.

name: Grape Candy
desc: You will drop an extra crystal if you hatch an empty egg.

name: Green Cap
desc: This green cap will diminish you... That is, it will make you smaller. See the world from a new angle!

name: Grim Hood
desc: Each time an enemy is killed in this room, your weapon damage increases.

name: Gum Bear
desc: Yeah! Increase the damage from all your pets.

name: Gunpowder Plot
desc: Each time you pick up a bomb, you get an extra one.

name: Hacking Tool
desc: I got this! Keys are no longer a problem.

name: Hair Dryer
desc: Let it blow your bullets farther, faster. Increase your weapon's range and rate of fire.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Hand Mirror
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a ricocheting bullet.

name: Hard Hat
desc: You won't take any environmental damage.

name: Hard Mints
desc: Every time your pet evolves, you may drop half a shield.

name: Headband
desc: The more times you jump, the more melee damage you do.

name: Heart Key
desc: If you don't have a key, you can use half a heart instead.

name: Heart Necklace
desc: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll drop extra hearts.

name: Heart of Fire
desc: You can revive after death, but you feel... tired. (Can only be used once.)

name: Heart of the Ocean
desc: The power of love! Add shields. Increase your weapon's damage.

name: Hero Mask
desc: This is your calling. Increase your jump height and movement speed.

name: Hiccups
desc: You will get a random item if you get hurt 6 times in the same room.

name: Hip Flask
desc: Take a shot. Take the shot. Rinse and repeat. Greatly increase your weapon damage.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Hot Chili
desc: Let your gun burn! All your bullets now deal fire damage.

name: Howard Reactor
desc: Hearts will be replaced by shields when they drop. The creator slightly modified the rules of the universe.

name: Hungry Amulet
desc: Kill enough enemies in melee, you will recover half a heart.

name: Hunter Queen
desc: Your melee attacks cause enemies to explode when they die.

name: Immortal Fangs
desc: Spawns 3 golden Angry Sprites.

name: Immortal Heart
desc: This is a legendary trophy. You can revive after death. (Can only be used once.)

name: Imperial Force
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a laser. Whether or not it hits anything is another matter...

name: Inferior Milk Powder
desc: The less your hearts, the bigger the Angry Sprites.

name: Infinite Key
desc: While you have this key, you can unlock anything for free. Expires at the end of the current level.

name: Inner Eye
desc: You can preview the description of an item without picking it up.

name: Inorganic Mod
desc: You have a chance to drop extra shields each time you kill an enemy.

name: Iron Heart
desc: You will lose hearts first even if you have shields. You are gradually accepting this fact.

name: Jelly Beans
desc: You have a chance to shoot random element bullets.

name: Jewelry Box
desc: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll get a protective shell.

name: Kendo Mask
desc: There's a chance that you'll block melee damage from enemies.

name: Kinetic Blade
desc: Gain shields after killing enemies with melee damage.

name: King's Crown
desc: Your weapon does more damage when you're at full hearts.

name: Knife and Fork
desc: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance to get an egg.

name: Kongming Lantern
desc: You will get a guard sprite when you get hurt.

name: Last Hope
desc: You fight for humanity! After each battle, you might receive extra shields.

name: Lemon Jelly
desc: The more eggs you have, the more times you can jump.

name: Lidless Eye
desc: It sees ...... EVERYTHING! Including your inner desires and fears.

name: Life Badge
desc: Increase heart containers.

name: Lightning Boots
desc: Jump Marks will create a ring of lightning.

name: Like of the King
desc: You have the King's approval. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your bullet velocity.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Lion Headgear
desc: The more pets you have, the more damage your gun does.

name: Lipstick
desc: Don't get it on your teeth. The shop will now replenish.

name: Lithium Battery
desc: There's a chance you'll fire an electric bullet.

name: Little Pickaxe
desc: A very useful tool. Reveal all nearby hidden rooms.

name: Locksmith
desc: If you don't have a key, you can use coins instead.

name: Lottery Ticket
desc: 777 coins! You feel extremely lucky... and lonely.

name: Love Yeast
desc: Hearts will turn into two moldy hearts 3 seconds after dropping.

name: Lucky Gold Coin
desc: Is it really not an illusion that you feel you have become lucky?

name: Mad Mask
desc: This IS the craziest thing you've ever seen. Greatly increase your rate of fire.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Magic Vortex
desc: Your weapon does more damage when your crystal containers are full. You have a big plan.

name: Magic Wand
desc: You will gain crystals when you get hurt.

name: Magical Bean
desc: This unbelievable bean will recover all your hearts and increase your weapon's range.

name: Magician Hat
desc: Each time you pick up a key, you get an extra one.

name: Maneki-Neko
desc: Meow... You get an extra bonus when you pick up coins.

name: Marshmallow
desc: When you're at full health, your eggs will never fail to hatch.

name: Matchbox
desc: If the egg touches stone - such as doors or chests - they'll both explode and disappear.

name: Medal of Honor
desc: It's about discipline. Increase your movement speed and your weapon damage.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Melting Calendar
desc: Time is a meaningless mortal construct. You understand this now, and your movement speed increases.

name: Mercenary Lord
desc: The more coins you have, the more damage your weapon does.

name: Mercy Hood
desc: May the love be with you. Double the amount of hearts recovered.

name: Metal Panties
desc: Make them regret ever touching you. Drop 6 safe bombs when you get hurt.

name: Microphone
desc: Jump Marks will create an enemy bullet deflecting wave.

name: Midnight Mask
desc: It's Friday! Increase your weapon's damage when you get hurt.

name: Mini Radar
desc: BEEP. BEEP. BEEP. Mark all secrets on your map.

name: Mjolnir
desc: Your melee attack deals electric damage.

name: Monk Hat
desc: Add a heart container and a crystal container. Keep the sun and rain off your face so you can concentrate on meditating.

name: Monocle
desc: You will drop an extra key if you hatch an empty egg.

name: Moonhead
desc: You're immune to touch damage while you're in the air.

name: Most Wanted List
desc: You get twice the coins after you kill enemies.

name: Motorcycle Helmet
desc: Increase your movement speed, weapon damage, and melee damage.

name: Mustard Poop
desc: Eggs can cause touch damage to enemies.

name: Mutated Orange
desc: This orange will make you SUPER strong. Increase your movement speed and weapon damage.

name: Nanotechnology
desc: After the bomb explodes, it will split into more small bombs.

name: Nerve System 6.0
desc: Increase your weapon damage and movement speed. Forget sheep, you keep dreaming of unicorns...

name: Night Vision
desc: Fire a special bullet every ten shots, causing greater damage to the enemy.

name: Nightmare Mask
desc: You will get a evil sprite when you get hurt.

name: Ninja Costume
desc: No one will ever see you coming. You can make an extra jump. Increase your melee damage.

name: Nougat
desc: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop a key.

name: Onion Helmet
desc: You get a temporary protective shell per room.

name: Ordinary Gloves
desc: 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups, 10km every day... your melee damage has skyrocketed!

name: Owl Headdress
desc: Gain an extra egg with each Jump Mark, but they will disappear once you land.

name: Pain Drop
desc: Fight through the pain. Let it give you strength. Increase you weapon damage and rate of fire.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Paper Crane
desc: [Characteristics] R-6 can use only shields, as he can't have any heart containers. Also, he can preview the description of items without picking them up.

name: Paper Plane
desc: Let it catch the breeze... Increase your weapons range and damage.

name: Paper Windmills
desc: Exhale as you pull the trigger to give your bullets a bit more oomph. Increase your rate of fire and weapon damage.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Party Popper
desc: Launches colorful bullets after your bomb explodes.

name: Pegasus
desc: You feel strong, feathery wings at your back. Flap them and lift into the air!

name: Pen No. 7
desc: You can use keys as bombs when you don't have any bombs.

name: Pepper Soup
desc: It'll bring tears to your eyes! ...Why, because it's so tasty, of course! Add a heart container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Persian Turban
desc: The beautiful gem in this turban functions as a number of crystal containers.

name: Ping Pong
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a bouncy bullet.

name: Pink Dart
desc: Let the feathered tip wing you on your way to victory. Increase your weapon's range and rate of fire.

name: Plague Mask
desc: You have a chance of recovering half a heart each time you kill an enemy.

name: Plan B
desc: Keys are not the only answer! You have a chance to unlock chests or doors with explosions.

name: Player Zero Ready
desc: Don't let up! The more enemies you hit without stopping, the more weapon damage you'll do.

name: Police Badge
desc: They have the right to remain silent... Add extra bullets per shot and increase your bullet velocity.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Popcorn
desc: All your bullets will explode on impact or after they travel a certain distance. Enjoy the show.

name: Popping Candy
desc: When you have the max number of Angry Sprites, gain an extra jump.

name: Power Diamond
desc: ABSOLUTE POWER! Upgrade your weapon, increase both your melee and weapon damage.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Power Helmet
desc: If you get hurt in this room, a ring of lightning will surround you and damage nearby enemies.

name: Prophet Chip
desc: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra shields.

name: Protein Powder
desc: The more eggs you have, the further you can shoot.

name: Pumpkinhead
desc: When you get hurt, you will explode. Anyone who survives might learn a lesson.

name: Quantum Core
desc: Increase your gun's damage and add shields. An incredible source of power. You've no idea how it works. Strings, maybe?

name: Rainbow Candy
desc: Every time your pet evolves, you'll get a gift.

name: Rainforest Souvenir
desc: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra eggs.

name: Rattling Will
desc: Angry Sprites explode when they die.

name: Ready Aim Eye
desc: Each time an enemy is killed in this room, your eye gets sharper, increasing your weapon attack speed.

name: Red Controller
desc: Angry Sprites become immortal upon entering battle, which then disappear at the end of the battle.

name: Red Flag
desc: Instead of throwing a bomb, place a mine on the ground.

name: Red Hat
desc: Your jumping can cause damage to enemies. Where is the princess?

name: Ritual Mask
desc: Add a crystal container. You can recover hearts when a certain amount of crystals are used.

name: Robot Armor
desc: You have a chance to drop extra shields when you get hurt.

name: Rocket Mod
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a heat-seeking rocket.

name: Rogue's Badge
desc: While in this room, each time you pick something up, your movement speed and jump height will increase.

name: Roly-Poly Toy
desc: You will drop an extra bomb if you hatch an empty egg.

name: Royal Antlers
desc: Increase your movement speed. You'll drop extra coins when you use keys.

name: Ruby Earrings
desc: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra hearts.

name: Running Shoes
desc: The sweet sneakers will increase your movement speed. Gotta go fast.

name: Rusty Antenna
desc: When you enter battle without full HP, generates Thunder beside you.

name: Rusty Key
desc: Every time you use a key, there's a chance you'll drop an extra bomb or an instant bomb.

name: Sacred Tears
desc: You have a chance to get a protective shell each time you kill an enemy.

name: Samurai's Soul
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a big bullet.

name: Sapper Backpack
desc: All your explosions are bigger, brighter, and better.

name: Sapphire Ring
desc: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra shields.

name: Sashimi Sushi
desc: Sorry, I don't speak Sushi. Add a heart container.

name: Saturn Lollipop
desc: The more eggs you have, the faster you can shoot.

name: Savage Bean
desc: Angry Sprites become bigger and move slower, but they can block bullets.

name: Scarlet Hourglass
desc: Generates an Angry Sprite when near death mid-battle.

name: Scarlet Tale
desc: Increase your rate of fire if you get hurt while in this room.

name: Schrdinger's Bet
desc: Are you dead or are you alive? You won't know until you die and wake up... and there's a chance you might.

name: Science Awards
desc: Enemies will explode when they touch any Jump Mark.

name: Screaming Soda
desc: Chance to spawn an Angry Sprite with an explosion.

name: Screwdriver
desc: Kill enough enemies, and you'll drop extra keys.

name: Seals Patch
desc: You've worked for this. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your movement speed.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Seed of Stone
desc: Your bullet will create a platform on the wall.

name: Serpent Staff
desc: When you use crystals, the same number of Angry Sprites will spawn.

name: Shadow Blade
desc: Nothing is True. Everything is Permitted. Do more weapon damage when you attack from behind.

name: Shadow Operation
desc: They'll never see you coming. Increase your weapon's range and your movement speed.

name: Shaman Mask
desc: After you activate all the Portal Stones, you'll get some eggs.

name: Shark Bait
desc: You can use eggs as bombs when you don't have any bombs.

name: Shroud
desc: Add a crystal container. You can get crystals after killing enemies.

name: Silly Frog
desc: You wouldn't wear them if they weren't useful, and these let you make an extra jump.

name: Silver Brooch
desc: Every time you pick up a coin, there's a chance you'll get extra keys.

name: Silver Compass
desc: Reveal the truth. Show all rooms on your map.

name: Slayer of Demons
desc: Kill enough enemies, and you'll get crystals.

name: Slingshot
desc: Pull back... Exhale slowly... Let go! TWANG! Add extra bullets per shot and increase your weapon's range.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Smiley Bomb
desc: Your bomb will clear a certain area of bullets.

name: Smithing Hammer
desc: Clang. Clang. Clang. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your weapon damage.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Snack Box
desc: Eggs will hatch random pickups instead of pets.

name: Snow Globe
desc: There's a chance you'll fire an ice bullet.

name: Soldier Mask
desc: Peekaboo! I see you! There's a chance your bullets will track enemies.

name: Soul Flask
desc: You hear whispers within the bottle... Add a heart container and recover some hearts.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Space Helmet
desc: To infinity... Increase your jump height.

name: Space Soda
desc: Atomized Cola, drink of the space age! Add a heart container and increase your weapon damage slightly.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Space Spanner
desc: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance to get a key.

name: Spartan Lineage
desc: The fewer hearts you have, the more damage your weapon does. SPARTAN!!!

name: Spear of Destiny
desc: Sometimes, the Fates just want someone dead. Increase your melee range.

name: Sphygmomanometer
desc: Angry Sprites become super-sized when you have no hearts.

name: Spicy Candy
desc: Spawns a ring of Angry Sprites when your pet levels up.

name: Spider Carton
desc: When Angry Sprite dies, it has a chance of dropping a flying heart or a flying shield.

name: Stark Module
desc: Increase your weapon damage and bullet velocity. Stark Brilliance(TM). (Stark is not responsible for any loss of limbs)[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Steel Gear
desc: The more keys you have, the faster your weapon shoots.

name: Strange Mask
desc: Ssssssomebody stop me! Add extra bullets per shot and a shield.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Strawberry Candy
desc: The more pets you have, the more bullets your fire.

name: Strength Badge
desc: Increase gun damage.

name: Sturdy Shield
desc: You've never felt stronger. Or better-looking. Add shields. Some attacks will deal no damage to you.

name: Super Logo
desc: You're at the top of your game. Upgrade your weapon. Increase your jump height and movement speed slightly.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Szechuan Cat Food
desc: On failure to hatch, spawn an Angry Sprite.

name: Szechuan Sauce
desc: There's a chance you'll fire a flame bullet.

name: Tanghulu
desc: A stick of candied hawthorn. Add a heart container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Telescopic Sight
desc: Increase your weapon's range. Also increase your jump height.

name: Tesla Coil
desc: A ring of lightning will surround you and damage nearby enemies.

name: The Crowbar
desc: Your favorite weapon! Increase your melee attack damage.

name: The Towel
desc: DON'T PANIC! You'll only lose a maximum of half a shield when you get hurt.

name: Thunder Engine
desc: The more shields you have, the faster you fire.

name: Tobe Beef
desc: The best beef EVER. Add a heart container.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Toffee Apple
desc: Every time your pet evolves, you'll drop half a heart.

name: Toilet-Plunger
desc: When picking up an item, there is a chance of getting an Angry Sprite.

name: Toy Home Run Bat
desc: The more eggs you have, the more melee range you have.

name: Traveler Hood
desc: Travel farther than ever before. You can make an extra jump.

name: Treasure Map
desc: Mark all hidden rooms on your map. You can see a faint signature on the back - Captain Jack S....?

name: Turtle Hat
desc: There's a chance that you'll block damage taken from behind.

name: Unknown Mask
desc: An extravagant crystal mask. It can be used as a crystal container and adds a shield - because no one wants to hit it.

name: Used Band-Aids
desc: Spawns Angry Sprites when you get hurt (based on number of hearts lost).

name: Useless Item
desc: This item is useless. Maybe there's some way you can make it useful?

name: V.O. Field
desc: If you're down to half a heart, you'll immediately drop a shield.

name: Vanilla Ice Cream
desc: The more eggs you have, the more damage your bullets do.

name: Virtual Assistant
desc: When you lose a shield, there's a chance you'll get a guardian sprite.

name: Void Coin
desc: There's a hole in the world... in your soul. Increase your weapon damage and rate of fire.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: Wade Tech
desc: It looks easy enough to install... Upgrade your weapon. Increase your rate of fire.[Note: May be removed since v1.4.5]

name: War Hammer
desc: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance a mine will drop.

name: Weapon Badge
desc: Increase gun level.

name: Welding Mask
desc: You have a chance to drop extra keys when you get hurt by an explosion.

name: Whetstone
desc: While in this room, the more times you use your melee attack, the more damage it does.

name: Winged Hat
desc: The little wings are so darn cute. And they let you make an extra jump.

name: Wings of Wisdom
desc: [Note: This is actually a Pickup which gives you the ability to fly. It can be obtained in the Athena/Cursed Athena boss room.]

name: Wizard Sword
desc: Each time you kill an enemy with melee damage, there's a chance you'll receive extra crystals.

name: Worst Blowing Gum
desc: The more pets you have, the more times you can jump.

name: X-Ray
desc: Your bullets can pass through enemies.

name: Faith Coin (Ares Token)
desc: Found in the Temple of Violence. Will enable the player to enter Floor 8 to encounter Ares there.

name: Faith Coin (Athena Token)
desc: Found in the Temple of Wisdom. Will enable the player to enter Floor 8 to encounter Athena there.

name: Ticket-1
desc: Brings the player to the "Level-?" floor after the current floor.

name: Ticket-2
desc: Brings the player to the "Level-?" floor after the current floor.

name: Ticket-3
desc: Brings the player to the "Level-?" floor after the current floor.

name: Ticket-4
desc: Brings the player to the "Level-?" floor after the current floor.

name: Ticket-5
desc: Brings the player to the "Level-?" floor after the current floor.

name: Ticket-6
desc: Brings the player to the "Level-?" floor after the current floor.

name: Chaos Ticket
desc: Brings the player to the "Level-?" floor after the current floor.
